availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Charlotte H. Cheser in Washington County, Kentucky, on June 1, 1835. Father of Melvina Cheser, Marisetta Cheser, Thomas A. Cheser, William Cheser, Lucy A. Cheser, Julina Cheser, Martina Cheser, Benedict S. Cheser, Fanny P. Cheser, and McHenry Cheser. Resident of Washington County in 1850. Farmer in Washington County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, p. 187B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, District 2, p. 67.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Washington County Marriages, Film 000241382, p. 514.
